caption.p: Meristematic cell damage. ( a) Normal view of the transmission tissue, ( b) normal appearance of epidermis cells, ( c) normal view of cortex cells, ( d) normal view of the cell nucleus, ( e) indistinct transmission tissue, ( f) epidermis cell deformation, ( g) thickening of the cortex cell wall, ( h) flattened cell nucleus) [Scale bar = 100 μm ( a, e), Scale bar = 50 μm ( b)–( d), ( f)–( h)].
